text:
Lucence Diagnostics | Singapore | Software Engineer | ONSITE

Lucence is a fast-growing genomic medicine company that invent advanced cancer diagnostics to change the way cancer is detected and treated. We specialize in building powerful diagnostic tests for cancers common in Asia.

Keywords: Angular/React/Vue, Java, python, golang, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, PostgreSQL

How to Apply: Email your CV to hr at lucencedx.com and tell us in 100 words why you think you would be a fit for our position.

More information here: https://www.lucencedx.com/careers/
